org.turbogwt.net.http.client.future

Interface ResponseContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.turbogwt.core.future.shared.Context
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResponseContextImpl

    public interface ResponseContext
extends org.turbogwt.core.future.shared.Context
    Context of requests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getHeader(String header)
      Returns the value of the requested header or null if the header was not specified.
      int getStatusCode()
      Returns the HTTP status code that is part of this response.
      String getStatusText()
      Returns the HTTP status message text.
      String getText()
      Returns the text associated with the response.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.turbogwt.core.future.shared.Context

        getState

    • Method Detail

      • getHeader

        String getHeader(String header)
        Returns the value of the requested header or null if the header was not specified.
        Parameters:
        header - the header to query for
        Returns:
        the value of response header
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the header name is empty
        NullPointerException - if the header name is null

        Returns the HTTP status code that is part of this response.

      • getStatusText

        String getStatusText()
        Returns the HTTP status message text.
        Returns:

      • getText
